A moment to pause

Before the screen draws you in, take a moment to consider what truly deserves your attention today.

Three principles for thoughtful viewing

Thoughtful viewing

Take time to choose programmes that truly interest you. Quality over quantity in your viewing choices.

Mindful scheduling

Plan your viewing with intention. Create space for reflection between programmes.

Purposeful selection

Every programme should serve a purpose—whether to inform, inspire, or genuinely entertain.
